meta.title: Yantra4D — Parametric 3D Design for Everyone
meta.description: Customize any dimension, export your perfect STL. Or turn your OpenSCAD models into configurators anyone can use.

hero.subtitle: Makers: customize any parameter and export your perfect STL. Creators: turn your OpenSCAD models into configurators anyone can use.

gallery.heading: Project Gallery
gallery.subtitle: 20 ready-to-customize parametric designs. Open any one in Studio and make it yours.

beforeAfter.tagline: From code to configurator. Zero learning curve.

forMakers.heading: Made for Makers
forMakers.subtitle: Stop printing someone else's dimensions. Customize everything, know the cost, export and print.

customize.title: Customize Everything
customize.desc: Sliders, toggles, color pickers. Change any dimension, see it in real-time 3D.

estimate.title: Know Before You Print
estimate.desc: Time, filament, and cost estimates before you waste a gram.

export.title: Export Your Way
export.desc: STL, 3MF, or OFF. One click. Ready for your slicer.

assembly.title: Assembly Made Clear
assembly.desc: Step-by-step 3D instructions. Bill of materials included.

browser.title: Works in Your Browser
browser.desc: No install. No account. Open a link, start customizing.

forCreators.heading: Built for Creators
forCreators.subtitle: Your designs deserve an audience beyond coders. Turn .scad files into shareable configurators.

upload.title: Upload and Done
upload.desc: Drop .scad files. Yantra4D auto-generates a configurator with params, modes, and presets.

share.title: Share With Anyone
share.desc: Tiny URL for any configuration. Your makerspace, your subreddit, your family.

control.title: Control Everything
control.desc: Params, presets, assembly steps, BOM, modes — one JSON manifest.

multiProject.title: Host Unlimited Projects
multiProject.desc: Multi-project dashboard. Every design gets its own configurator.

openSource.title: Open Source Forever
openSource.desc: AGPLv3. Self-host, fork, contribute. Your configurators are yours.

step1.title: Browse
step1.desc: Pick a project from the gallery or follow a shared link.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Adjust dimensions with sliders and toggles. See changes in real-time 3D.

step3.title: Export & Print
step3.desc: Download your STL and send it to your slicer. Done.

step1.title: Upload .scad
step1.desc: Drop your OpenSCAD source files into Yantra4D.

step2.title: Configure
step2.desc: Edit the manifest — params, modes, presets, assembly steps.

step3.title: Share
step3.desc: Get a link. Anyone can customize and export your design.

demo.heading: Try It Now
demo.description: Full interactive Studio — adjust parameters, switch modes, and export renders.

openSourceSection.heading: Free. Open Source. Forever.
openSourceSection.description: Self-host, contribute, build on top — own your configurators.
openSourceSection.techNote: Built with OpenSCAD, React, Three.js, Flask, and WebAssembly.

cta.heading: Your next print starts here
cta.subtitle: No account required. No install. Just open.
